gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfChangeProvisionPensionObligationsOnBehalfOfParticipantsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
